alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 28 at 8:20AM MST until October 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of Coconino County including the lower elevations of Grand Canyon, Marble Canyon, and Glen Canyon. This includes Page, Lees Ferry, Phantom Ranch, and Supai. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing temperatures will kill gardens, crops, and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons
